name: Aerium
description:
Journey through an atmospheric space as you try to realize your quest, make it to the top, and collect the three golden orbs needed to save your world.

Your world depends on you!

Aerium is an "air" + "terrarium" (air world) created in Unity.

Controls:
Move: WASD / Arrow keys
Look: Cursor

Jump: Spacebar
Restart: R

Quit: Esc / Command+Q
